name: Constellar Soul M7
text: Must be Soul Summoned by banishing "Constellar Ptolemy M7" and cannot be summoned by other means (Attatch the banished monster's Overlay Units to this card.). Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then target 1 monster on the field or in either player's Graveyard; return that target to the hand.
